page.title: 01SUMMARY
page.content:
{SUMMARY OF LAND STUDIED The block of land we are covering west of Pontypool, is mainly a{mountainous {rural area.
We have looked at old coal mines, railways that have been discontinued and schools that have been closed.
Our block extends fromthe Sowhill area of Pontypool to Blaen-y-cwm near Llanhilleth in the North and from West of Sebastopol to Mynydd Llwyd in the South.
There are some very interesting features in this block, e.g. the {Re-Chem Industrial Waste Disposal {"dumping ground" at Tirpentwys. }We will talk of this, later on.
